name: "Growth" like an Adult
description:
#Spring2DJam #FirstTimeJam

This game is about choises! Every level you can choose how you want to proceed.

In total there are 7 endings! Can you live every life? Enjoy <3

Inputs:

W -> Jump

A -> Walk left

S -> Walk Right

Space -> Interact with the door and girls

Made by: Tulio Ezequiel @TulioCoq and Iza @Blaze.arts

"Salve" from Brazil!!!
